name: Get a stage KO with the Acid on Planet Zebes
Get an Opponent to 200%
Get the Special Move Bonus
Beat Normal (3 Stock) w/ Link and Falcon
Get the Pokemon Finish Bonus
Beat Very Easy (5 Stock)
Get the Good Friend or True Friend Bonus
Catch a Beedrill or Staryu (in 1P Game)
Defeat Kirby Team (in 1P Game) using only DK Neutral B
Beat Break the Targets w/ Samus, Kirby, and Pikachu
Get the Cheap Shot Bonus
SD on Board the Platforms with every character
Beat Very Hard (1 Stock) w/ Link
Get a KO (in 1P Game) with the MotionSensorBomb
Get the Judo Warrior or Throw Down Bonus
Break Fox's Reflector
Get the Mew Catch Bonus
Get the Speed Demon or Speed King Bonus
Beat Break the Targets using only B moves with Ness
Beat Very Hard (1 Stock)
Get the Shooter Bonus
Beat Normal (3 Stock)
Beat Board the Platforms w/ DK, Fox, and Jigglypuff
Get the Star Finish Bonus
Defeat Samus (in 1P Game) using only Ness Up B
